get.description: Health check endpoint.
List available importers.

schema.title: Response List Importers Api Importers Get

get.description: List available export formats.

schema.title: Response List Exporters Api Exporters Get

post.description: Import an agent from config.
Import an agent from an uploaded file (XLSForm, JSON, etc.).
Export an agent graph to a format.

schema.title: Response Export Agent Api Agents Export Post

post.description: Run a single test case.
Run multiple test cases.
Evaluate a transcript against metrics.

schema.title: Response Evaluate Transcript Api Evaluate Post

get.description: Get current settings from .voicetest.toml.
Get default settings (not from file).
List all agents.

schema.title: Response List Agents Api Agents Get

post.description: Create an agent from config dict or file path.

schema.title: Response Create Agent Api Agents Post

get.description: Get agent by ID.

schema.title: Response Get Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Get
Response Update Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Put
Response Delete Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Delete

get.description:
Get the AgentGraph for an agent.

For linked agents (source_path), uses file mtime for ETag-based caching.
Returns 304 Not Modified if the file hasn't changed.

Extract dynamic variable names from agent prompts.

Scans general_prompt and all node state_prompt values for {{var}} placeholders.
Returns unique variable names in first-appearance order.

schema.title: Response Get Agent Variables Api Agents  Agent Id  Variables Get

get.description: Get all snippets defined for an agent.

schema.title: Response Get Snippets Api Agents  Agent Id  Snippets Get

put.description: Replace all snippets for an agent.

schema.title: Response Update All Snippets Api Agents  Agent Id  Snippets Put

put.description: Create or update a single snippet.

schema.title: Response Update Snippet Api Agents  Agent Id  Snippets  Name  Put
Response Delete Snippet Api Agents  Agent Id  Snippets  Name  Delete

post.description: Run auto-DRY analysis on an agent's prompts.

schema.title: Response Analyze Dry Api Agents  Agent Id  Analyze Dry Post

post.description: Apply snippets: add them to graph and replace occurrences in prompts with {%name%} refs.
Create an agent from an uploaded file (XLSForm, JSON, etc.).

schema.title: Response Create Agent From File Api Agents Upload Post

put.description:
Update a general or node-specific prompt.

When node_id is None, updates source_metadata.general_prompt.
When node_id is set, updates that node's state_prompt.
For linked-file agents, writes back to the source file on disk.
Merge updates into an agent's source_metadata.

get.description: Get an agent's metrics configuration.

schema.title: Response Get Metrics Config Api Agents  Agent Id  Metrics Config Get
Response Update Metrics Config Api Agents  Agent Id  Metrics Config Put

get.description: List all test cases for an agent, including file-based linked tests.

schema.title: Response List Tests For Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Tests Get

post.description:
Create a test case for an agent.

If the agent has linked test files, the test is appended to the first file.
Otherwise it is stored in the database.

schema.title: Response Create Test Case Api Agents  Agent Id  Tests Post

post.description:
Link a JSON test file to an agent.

The file must exist, contain valid JSON, and be a JSON array.
Tests from the file will appear alongside DB tests via list_for_agent_with_linked.

schema.title: Response Link Test File Api Agents  Agent Id  Tests Paths Post

delete.description:
Unlink a test file from an agent.

Removes the path from tests_paths. The file itself is not deleted.

schema.title: Response Unlink Test File Api Agents  Agent Id  Tests Paths Delete

post.description: Export test cases for an agent to a specified format.

schema.title: Response Export Tests For Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Tests Export Post

put.description: Update a test case (DB or linked file).

schema.title: Response Update Test Case Api Tests  Test Id  Put

delete.description: Delete a test case (DB or linked file).

schema.title: Response Delete Test Case Api Tests  Test Id  Delete

post.description:
Load demo agent and tests into the database.

If the demo agent already exists, returns its info without creating duplicates.

get.description: List available test gallery fixtures.

schema.title: Response List Gallery Api Gallery Get

get.description: List all runs for an agent.

schema.title: Response List Runs For Agent Api Agents  Agent Id  Runs Get

post.description: Start a new test run. Tests execute in background, poll GET /runs/{id} for results.

schema.title: Response Start Run Api Agents  Agent Id  Runs Post

get.description: Get a run with all results.

schema.title: Response Get Run Api Runs  Run Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a run and all its results.

schema.title: Response Delete Run Api Runs  Run Id  Delete

post.description:
Run audio evaluation on an existing test result.

Performs TTS->STT round-trip on assistant messages and re-evaluates
metrics using the "heard" text.

schema.title: Response Audio Eval Result Api Results  Result Id  Audio Eval Post

post.description:
Diagnose why a test result failed and suggest a fix.

Analyzes the graph structure, transcript, and failed metrics to identify
the root cause and propose concrete prompt/transition changes.

Optional body: {"model": "provider/model-name"} to override the judge model.

schema.title: Response Diagnose Result Api Results  Result Id  Diagnose Post

post.description:
Apply proposed changes to a copy of the graph and rerun the test.

Non-destructive: does not persist changes.

schema.title: Response Apply Fix Api Results  Result Id  Apply Fix Post

post.description:
Revise a previous fix attempt based on new metric results.

Given the original diagnosis and previous changes, produce a revised fix.

Optional body field: "model" to override the judge model.

schema.title: Response Revise Fix Endpoint Api Results  Result Id  Revise Fix Post

post.description:
Persist proposed changes to the agent graph.

Applies changes and saves the modified graph.

schema.title: Response Save Fix Api Agents  Agent Id  Save Fix Post

get.description: Check if LiveKit server is reachable.

post.description:
Start a live voice call with an agent.

Creates a LiveKit room and spawns an agent worker subprocess.
Returns connection info including a token for the browser to join.

get.description: Get call status and transcript.

post.description: End a live call and save the transcript as a run.

schema.title: Response End Call Api Calls  Call Id  End Post

post.description:
Start a text chat session with an agent.

Creates a ConversationEngine in-process (no LiveKit or subprocess needed).
Returns a chat_id for WebSocket connection.
End a text chat session and save the transcript as a run.

schema.title: Response End Chat Session Api Chats  Chat Id  End Post

get.description: List all available platforms and their configuration status.

schema.title: Response List Platforms Api Platforms Get

get.description: Check if a platform API key is configured.

post.description: Configure platform credentials. Returns 409 if already configured.

get.description: List agents from any supported platform.

schema.title: Response List Platform Agents Api Platforms  Platform  Agents Get

post.description: Import an agent from any supported platform by ID.
Export an agent graph to any supported platform.

get.description: Check if an agent can be synced to its source platform.

post.description: Sync an agent to its source platform.

get.description: Serve the SPA for all non-API routes.

snippets.title: Snippets
snippets.description: Named text snippets referenced via {%name%} in prompts

default_model.title: Default Model
default_model.description: Default LLM model for this agent (from import)

AgentGraph-Input.title: AgentGraph
AgentGraph-Input.description:
Complete agent workflow graph.

This is the unified internal representation (IR) that all importers
convert to. It captures the full structure of an agent's conversation
flow including nodes, transitions, and metadata.

snippets.title: Snippets
snippets.description: Named text snippets referenced via {%name%} in prompts

default_model.title: Default Model
default_model.description: Default LLM model for this agent (from import)

AgentGraph-Output.title: AgentGraph
AgentGraph-Output.description:
Complete agent workflow graph.

This is the unified internal representation (IR) that all importers
convert to. It captures the full structure of an agent's conversation
flow including nodes, transitions, and metadata.

AgentNode-Input.title: AgentNode
AgentNode-Input.description:
Single node (state) in the agent workflow graph.

Each node represents a distinct conversational state with its own
state-specific prompt, available tools, and possible transitions.
The general_prompt is stored separately in AgentGraph.source_metadata.

AgentNode-Output.title: AgentNode
AgentNode-Output.description:
Single node (state) in the agent workflow graph.

Each node represents a distinct conversational state with its own
state-specific prompt, available tools, and possible transitions.
The general_prompt is stored separately in AgentGraph.source_metadata.

ApplySnippetsRequest.title: ApplySnippetsRequest
ApplySnippetsRequest.description: Request to apply snippets: add them to graph and replace occurrences in prompts.

AudioSettings.title: AudioSettings
AudioSettings.description: TTS/STT service configuration for audio evaluation.

CreateAgentRequest.title: CreateAgentRequest
CreateAgentRequest.description: Request to create an agent from config or file path.

CreateTestCaseRequest.title: CreateTestCaseRequest
CreateTestCaseRequest.description: Request to create a test case.

ExportFormatInfo.title: ExportFormatInfo
ExportFormatInfo.description: Export format information for API response.

ExportRequest.title: ExportRequest
ExportRequest.description: Request to export an agent graph.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Compute display positions for exported nodes

ExportToPlatformRequest.title: ExportToPlatformRequest
ExportToPlatformRequest.description: Request to export an agent to a platform.

ExportToPlatformResponse.title: ExportToPlatformResponse
ExportToPlatformResponse.description: Response from exporting an agent to a platform.

GlobalMetric.title: GlobalMetric
GlobalMetric.description:
A metric that runs on all tests for an agent.

Global metrics are evaluated against every test transcript,
useful for compliance checks that should always pass.

ImportRequest.title: ImportRequest
ImportRequest.description: Request to import an agent config.

LinkTestFileRequest.title: LinkTestFileRequest
LinkTestFileRequest.description: Request to link a test file to an agent.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Single message in a conversation transcript.

MetricResult.title: MetricResult
MetricResult.description: Evaluation result for a single metric criterion.

ModelSettings.title: ModelSettings
ModelSettings.description: LLM model configuration. None means not configured (use defaults or test overrides).

RemoteAgentInfo.title: RemoteAgentInfo
RemoteAgentInfo.description: Information about a remote agent on a platform.

RunOptions.title: RunOptions
RunOptions.description:
Options for test execution.

LLM model strings use LiteLLM format: "provider/model"
Examples: "groq/llama-3.1-8b-instant", "openai/gpt-4o-mini"

Model fields are Optional - None means not configured (will use defaults).

flow_judge.title: Flow Judge
flow_judge.description: Run flow judge to validate transitions

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.description: Stream tokens as they are generated

test_model_precedence.title: Test Model Precedence
test_model_precedence.description: When enabled, test-specific llm_model overrides global settings

split_transitions.title: Split Transitions
split_transitions.description: Evaluate transitions separately from response generation (debugging)

audio_eval.title: Audio Eval
audio_eval.description: Auto-run TTS→STT audio evaluation on every test

RunTestRequest.title: RunTestRequest
RunTestRequest.description: Request to run a single test.

env.title: Env
env.description: Environment variables to set (e.g., API keys for LLM providers)

StartCallRequest.title: StartCallRequest
StartCallRequest.description: Request to start a live voice call.

StartChatRequest.title: StartChatRequest
StartChatRequest.description: Request to start a text chat session.

StartChatResponse.title: StartChatResponse
StartChatResponse.description: Response from starting a text chat.

StartRunRequest.title: StartRunRequest
StartRunRequest.description: Request to start a test run.

SyncToPlatformRequest.title: SyncToPlatformRequest
SyncToPlatformRequest.description: Request to sync an agent to its source platform.

SyncToPlatformResponse.title: SyncToPlatformResponse
SyncToPlatformResponse.description: Response from syncing an agent to a platform.

TestCase.title: TestCase
TestCase.description:
Single test case definition.

Two test types are supported:

1. LLM tests (type="llm"): Use an LLM judge to evaluate semantic metrics.
   {
       "name": "Billing inquiry",
       "user_prompt": "Ask about a charge on your bill...",
       "metrics": ["Agent was helpful and professional"],
       "type": "llm"
   }

2. Rule tests (type="rule"): Use deterministic pattern matching.
   {
       "name": "Greeting check",
       "user_prompt": "Say hello",
       "includes": ["welcome", "help"],
       "excludes": ["goodbye"],
       "patterns": ["REF-[A-Z0-9]+"],
       "type": "rule"
   }

Legacy type values "simulation" and "unit" are mapped to "llm" and "rule".

TestResult.title: TestResult
TestResult.description: Result of running a single test case.

TestRun.title: TestRun
TestRun.description: Aggregated results from multiple test cases.

ToolCall.title: ToolCall
ToolCall.description: Record of a tool invocation during conversation.

ToolDefinition.title: ToolDefinition
ToolDefinition.description: Definition of a tool/function available to the agent.

Transition.title: Transition
Transition.description: Edge from one node to another in the agent graph.

TransitionCondition.title: TransitionCondition
TransitionCondition.description:
Condition that triggers a transition between nodes.

Supports multiple condition types:
- llm_prompt: LLM evaluates a natural language condition
- equation: Deterministic evaluation of a formula (e.g., {{age}} > 18)
- tool_call: Transition triggered by specific tool invocation
- always: Unconditional transition

UpdateMetadataRequest.title: UpdateMetadataRequest
UpdateMetadataRequest.description: Request to merge updates into an agent's source_metadata.

UpdateMetricsConfigRequest.title: UpdateMetricsConfigRequest
UpdateMetricsConfigRequest.description: Request to update an agent's metrics configuration.

UpdatePromptRequest.title: UpdatePromptRequest
UpdatePromptRequest.description:
Request to update a prompt (general, node, or transition).

- node_id=None: updates source_metadata.general_prompt
- node_id set, transition_target_id=None: updates node's state_prompt
- node_id set, transition_target_id set: updates transition condition value

UpdateSnippetRequest.title: UpdateSnippetRequest
UpdateSnippetRequest.description: Request to create or update a single snippet.
